creator: isaac@shabtay.com

text:
Hi Isaac,

Actually this was a bug in the previous implementation. The border-before
(after) of a column applies only to the first (last) row of the table, be it in
the header (footer) or not.

To achieve your desired result you must add a border-before specification on
table-rows.

Vincent
